cancer_type: Medulloblastoma and Other CNS Embryonal Tumors, Childhood
title: Brain Tumorsâ€”Patient Version

content.text: Brain and spinal cord (also known as central nervous system, or CNS) tumors can be benign or malignant. Explore the links on this page to learn more about the many different CNS tumor types and how they are treated. We also have information about brain cancer statistics, research, and clinical trials.
NCI does not have PDQ evidence-based information about prevention of brain tumors.
NCI does not have PDQ evidence-based information about screening for brain tumors.
The information in this section is meant to help you cope with the many issues and concerns that occur when you have cancer.

National Cancer Institute
at the National Institutes of Health
